channel.title: Problems loading from jar? video included [fixed]
channel.description:
http://videobam.com/LKrfu
As you can see in the video when I run the client using the IDE it runs perfectly(lol) and loads but after its been jarred it doesnt seem to be able to load something(cache packed title i believe).
i have no clue as i believe my paths are correct because the client loads in the first place and i dont understand the gibberish in the client mostly
EDIT: basically im a moron and commented something out i shouldnt have in the main method. the IDE ran the client fine using the init() method i believe. however everything else ran the main(string..) method with the commented out stuff. i need to learn about applets :P
